answerText: The Bell Jar[10] This author created Esther Greenwood in The Bell Jar. She also wrote poems like "Lady Lazarus" and "Daddy."
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | 1 | 5 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This novel's protagonist refers to her boyfriend Buddy Willard as a hypocrite, and Buddy spends much of this novel in a tuberculosis sanitorium. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel whose protagonist masquerades as EllyHigginbottom while on a literary internship in New York and later undergoes shock therapy at the behest of Doctor Nolan.
